required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 09, 2023
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Efficacy of Topical Serum X for Skin Brightening
clinical_study.official_title: The Efficacy of Topical Serum X Containing Arbutin and Glutathione for Skin Brightening

lead_sponsor.agency: Ungku Shahrin Medical Aesthetic Research & Innovation (USMARI) Centre

clinical_study.source: Ungku Shahrin Medical Aesthetic Research & Innovation (USMARI) Centre

brief_summary.textblock:
This study is conducted to evaluate the effectiveness of topical serum X containing arbutin and glutathione for skin brightening. The study duration is 12 weeks and the skin assessment will be carried out at baseline, week 4, 8 and week 12.The main questions this study aims to answer are:
1. The skin brightening effect of the product on facial skin.
2. To observe any adverse effect occurrence with the usage of the product.

primary_outcome.measure: Changes in skin tone from baseline and at week 4, week 8, and week 12 after usage of serum X.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and at week 4, week 8, and week 12
primary_outcome.description: Skin tone will be assessed using JANUS III skin analyzer

primary_outcome.measure: Adverse effect after using serum X
primary_outcome.description: Based on adverse effect occurrence on participants that occur during study period (12 weeks

arm_group.description: Participants will used serum X twice daily for 12 weeks

intervention.description: Serum X contain arbutin and glutathione

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Malaysia citizen
- Male and female (age 18-30 years old)
Exclusion Criteria:
- Participant with severe acne skin condition
- Participant who is taking isotretinoin, immunocompromised patients and received laser and light treatment within the last three months
- Participant who undergo whitening or cosmetic treatments such as botox and dermal fillers within the previous six month
- Participant with a history of facial surgery such as facelift or nose reshaping
- Participant with history of allergies to any ingredient in the study product
- Participant who is pregnant or plan to get pregnant

facility.name: Ungku Shahrin Medical Aesthetic Research & Innovation (USMARI) Centre
